meanings.definition: One who installs or repairs ceilings.
meanings.sent1: The ceiler fixed the ceiling in our living room.
meanings.sent2: The ceiler came to our house to repair the damaged ceiling.
meanings.sent3: The ceiler joked that he had a 'high-flying' job.
meanings.sent4: The ceiler's hands moved like magic as he repaired the ceiling.
meanings.sent5: The ceiler's expertise made the ceiling look brand new.

meanings.definition: A tool used for smoothing ceilings.
meanings.sent1: The ceiler used a special tool to smooth out the ceiling.
meanings.sent2: Make sure you have the right ceiler for the job before starting.
meanings.sent3: The ceiler accidentally left his smoothing tool on the roof.
meanings.sent4: The ceiler's tool glided effortlessly over the ceiling, leaving it flawless.
meanings.sent5: The shiny ceiler made the ceiling smooth as silk.

meanings.definition: A material used to cover or finish ceilings.
meanings.sent1: The new ceiler was perfect for covering the old ceiling.
meanings.sent2: Make sure to choose a durable ceiler for your ceiling project.
meanings.sent3: The ceiler material shimmered in the light, making the room look elegant.
meanings.sent4: The ceiler transformed the ceiling into a work of art with the material.
meanings.sent5: The soft ceiler material made the ceiling cozy and inviting.
